subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: No. 1-seeded Siena outlasted No. 2 Niagara, 77-70, to clinch the league’s automatic berth for the second consecutive season.
snippet: No. 1-seeded Siena outlasted No. 2 Niagara, 77-70, to clinch the league’s automatic berth for the second consecutive season.
